name: df-nmop
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cnop, cmpt(s0, co(chba, cmap, chba), csup(cab(s1, wrex(s2, chba, wa(wbr(cfv(cno, cv(s2)), cle, nat1), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cno, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))), cxr, clt)))
comment: Define the norm of a Hilbert space operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
